publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6409.2 Mike Rumbles: Relationships between HM Government and the Scottish Parliament and Government—As an amendment to motion (S3M-6409) in the name of Annabel Goldie, insert at end ", and believes that the UK Government’s programme, including plans to raise the income tax threshold to £10,000, build a new, sustainable economy and reform the political system, will put fairness at the heart of government and deliver real benefits to the people of Scotland."
